comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110124 Firefox/4.0b10pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110124 Firefox/4.0b10pre

"Ir a Mi Vodafone" section shows a misaligned login form in Firefox 4

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Enter http://www.vodafone.es/
2. See misaligned login form

Actual Results:  
I see login form misaligned

Expected Results:  
Login form correct view
